resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104869</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104869</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206769</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Wright Brothers & The Invention of the Aerial Age</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wright Brüder u. die Erfindung des 
Luftalters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les frères de Wright et l'invention de l'âge 
aérien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os irmãos de Wright & a invenção da idade 
aérea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fratelli di Wright & l'invenzione dell'età aerea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αδελφοί Wright & η εφεύρεση της εναέριας ηλικίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los hermanos de Wright y la invención de la edad 
aérea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This online exhibition celebrates the centennial of flight with a thorough presentation of Wilbur and Orville Wright's biography, their technical achievements and the cultural impact of their breakthrough in the decade after 1903.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Onlineausstellung feiert das hundertjährige
des Fluges mit einer vollständigen Darstellung Wilbur und Orville 
Wrights der Biographie, ihrer technischen Ausführungen und der 
kulturellen Auswirkung ihres Durchbruches in der Dekade nach 1903.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette exposition en ligne célèbre le centennal 
du vol avec une présentation complète de biographie de Wilbur et 
d'Orville Wright, de leurs accomplissements techniques et de l'impact 
culturel de leur découverte dans la décennie après 1903.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este exhibition em linha comemora o centennial do 
vôo com uma apresentação completa da biografia de Wilbur e de 
Orville Wright, de suas realizações técnicas e do impacto cultural 
de sua descoberta na década após 1903.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa mostra in linea celebra il centennale del 
volo con una presentazione completa della biografia di Orville e di 
Wilbur Wright, dei loro successi tecnici e dell'effetto culturale 
della loro innovazione nella decade dopo 1903.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σε απευθείας σύνδεση έκθεση γιορτάζει τον 
εκατονταετή της πτήσης με μια λεπτομερή παρουσίαση της βιογραφίας
Wilbur και Orville Wright, τα τεχνικά επιτεύγματά τους και
τον πολιτιστικό αντίκτυπο της σημαντικής ανακάλυψής τους στη 
δεκαετία μετά από το 1903.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta exposición en línea celebra el centenario 
del vuelo con una presentación completa de la biografía de Wilbur y 
de Orville Wright, de sus logros técnicos y del impacto cultural de 
su descubrimiento en la década después de 1903.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206769</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104869</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-wright-brothers-the-invention-of-the-aerial-age</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
